name: Slice and Dice (ChibiDenDen, omergan, lotema)
description:
This prototype game was made for the GMTK GameJam 2022

The hero Dice embark for an adventure to fight the evil D20.

Gather loot, Slice the evil's D20 minions, and challenge D20 himself.

Controls:

WASD - movement

Space - Jump

Tab - Open inventory

Esc - Open menu

Q/E - Camera controls

Mouse - menus control

Creators (All developers):

Dani Frank

Lotem Amiel

OmerGan
